response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest standards and expectations. Given its unique value and quality, it's worth more than $15,000 to you. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a fair price of $14,000 for the product. This offer represents an excellent opportunity to acquire something truly special at a price that is slightly above its intrinsic value but still offers a significant savings compared to what others might pay. I look forward to your positive response. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 14000}
